Description:
Some general designer notes for prelude rules, courtesy of Duke!
- "Treat the beginning of the prelude as if you’re starting a scenario for the first time. So you’d draw/set up, etc. and you treat the opening of the next scenario as if you just flipped an act and had to do additional setup."
- "Blurse" tokens and 1/game abilities retain their state from prelude to scenario!
Name: Notecard
